channel.title: Play a Bootstrapped Startup in this Business Simulation Game
channel.description:
The highs and lows of starting a tech business, growing it and making it public packed into a crazy 40-minute card game.
Bootstrapping is hard. The game mechanics will give an appreciation / understanding of the challenges of bootstrapping a tech business amidst a competitive market.
The crowdfunding campaign is live: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/egarbugli/control-alt-deceit
